Title: Seikaisuru Kado
Description:
['Cool-headed and rational, Koujirou Shindou is a government official and master negotiator with a well-earned reputation. While departing on a business trip, a giant cube materializes and his plane is taken undamaged into the mysterious, indestructible structure.', '
', '
', '
', "
As Japanese authorities attempt to identify the cube's properties and origins, Shindou encounters an otherworldly entity known as Yaha-kui zaShunina, who materializes in the form of a human man. He assures Shindou that the passengers are not in any danger and requests help in negotiations with the human world.", '
', '
', '
', '
Hailing from a higher dimensional universe known as Novo, Yaha-kui zaShunina is able to transfer information between Novo and Shindou's universe through a cube called Kado. Despite having these unfathomable abilities, he does not appear hostile. Instead, he announces that he has come to this world with only one intention: to "advance" humanityâ€”starting with Japan.', '
', '
', '
', '
[Written by MAL Rewrite]']
Related: ['Adaptation: Seikaisuru Kado', 'Prequel: Seikaisuru Kado: Ninovo', 'Summary: Seikaisuru Kado: Ekwari']
Characters: ['Yaha-kui zaShunina', 'Tsukai, Saraka', 'Shindou, Koujirou', 'Hanamori, Shun', 'Shinawa, Kanata', 'Yukika', 'Asano, Shuuhei', 'Fukamizu, Sophie', 'Gonnou, Takumi', 'Natsume, Ritsu']
Voices: ['Terashima, Takuma', 'Ichimichi, Mao', 'Miura, Hiroaki', 'Saitou, Souma', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Serizawa, Yuu', 'Akabane, Kenji', 'Kaida, Yuuko', 'Kirimoto, Takuya', 'Itou, Shizuka']
